hero.title: A complete IT department for your business FR
hero.subtitle: At Nova Solution, we modernize, secure, and support the IT systems of Quebec's small and medium sized businesses.

msp.title: The largest managed IT service provider (MSP) in Greater Montreal
msp.subtitle: Since 2024, Nova Solution has been the leader in IT services for Quebec's small and medium sized businesses.

managed.title: Managed IT Services
managed.description: For businesses without an IT team, Nova Solution takes care of all your IT and cybersecurity needs, providing your users with lightning-fast support, industry-leading cybersecurity, and full Office 365 integration for more efficient work.

coManaged.title: Co-Managed IT Services
coManaged.description: Complement your IT department with Nova Solution Technologies. Benefit from our experts and best practices according to your needs in cybersecurity, Cloud & infrastructure management, support, or projects.
